sourcesContent: import React, { useState } from "react"; const Form = () => { const [formData, seFormData] = useState({ firstName: "", lastName: "", email: "", comment: "", isFriendly: true, employment: "", movieList: "", }); function handleChange(event) { const { name, type, value, checked } = event.target; seFormData((prevFormData) => { return { ...prevFormData, [name]: type === "checkbox" ? checked : value, }; }); } function handleSubmit(event){ event.preventDefault() console.log() } return (
